documents.document: Aww well wanted the 🦁🦁🦁 to win not happening! when’s the real season start! 😜😜

@pj_mclaren that’s coz we were paying 10-15k a weeks wages on a few players! Now we can afford 5k max on certain first teamers who will make a big difference!

@pj_mclaren You joking? 😂😂 5k a week is very good business for a player of his calibre! Hibs have to sell on the cheap or come jan he can spk to clubs. 2 mil + a player is max what hibs will get! tbh it’s what he’s worth!

@pj_mclaren Mallan was a good player, disagree that McGinn will go for the right money! You want 5 mil be lucky to get 2 mil plus you 30% to St Mirren, prob get Allan back but in a team wi no McGinn or mcgeouch backing him up, hibs could toil. Lennon to be found out this year 😜

@pj_mclaren Of course he will be a top earner but no more than 5/6k tops! Especially entering his last year Norwich can’t afford to pay him off so therefore becomes a free agent end of the season! Crawford works for me but not to be! You lot banking on selling McGinn for players 😂😂
@Tony_Watt7 all the best at st Johnstone! Bags off ability & pretty sure tommy wright will get the best from you! 👍🏻⚽️🇱🇻

@pj_mclaren Break the bank? 😂😂😂 Naismith is costing nowt more than any other? Norwich covering wages again! I wanted to sign Crawford, I think it’s more to do with his fitness tbh! missed half the season wi Hamilton last year!
